about_the_game:
Guild Master is an adventure RPG where you take care of an old guild and go on adventures with rouge-lite elements.

Centuries ago the world ended. Magic failed the world and the forces of evil decimated the great civilizations. Now, for some reason you have been brought back to a long abandoned guild. As the new Guild Master you have to set out to restore the ruined guild to its former glory and perhaps even uncover the secrets of the old world. By farming, crafting, building, mining, fishing, gathering and adventuring you might just be able to do so.


  • Restore the abandoned guild to glory! Decorate and build a thriving guild and attract guild members from across the world to aid in your efforts.
  • Plant and tend to crops in order to cook foods, brew potions and more!
  • Fish, gather & mine to retrieve the resources you need!
  • Build a multitude of crafting stations and craft better tools, armour, furniture and guild upgrades!
  • Recruit new members to your guild from all around the world! Each member has a unique effect to improve the guild.


  • Go on adventures in multiple unique and procedurally generated locations around the world! Each location offers different environments, resources, enemies and secrets...
  • Find strong power-ups! Each location offers a unique set of power ups, to make each adventure different.
  • Beat powerful bosses! Each location has a powerful boss to defeat, with equally powerful rewards for those who do.
  • Choose your own playstlye! Will you play as a warrior, a mage, an archer or something inbetween? Choose your weapon, gear abilites and skills freely to suit your playstyle! Any combination is possible.

  • Level up your skills! Learn new recepies, discover new abilities and become better at anything that you set your mind to.
  • Build permanent guild upgrades! Build upgrades to gain benefits to all your activities in the guild and on adventures.
  • Assign skills in the skill tree! Mix and match skills with different specializations to build the character you want to play.

name: Guild Master
short_description: Guild Master is an adventure RPG where you take care of a guild in between roguelike adventures. Farm, fish, recruit new members, upgrade your guild and adventure to different locations, each with unique bosses and power-ups. Will you be the Guild Master and discover the secrets of the old world?
